body.p: The issues addressed in this Interpretation are:

li.p: when refunds or reductions in future contributions should be regarded as available in accordance with the definition of the asset ceiling in paragraph 8 of IAS 19.
how a minimum funding requirement might affect the availability of reductions in future contributions.
when a minimum funding requirement might give rise to a liability.
